FILE: cm235510v11.0.txt
DYAD: PORTUGAL - TANZANIA
RIVALRY: RIV642
DISPUTE(S): MID1364 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180213
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180213

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1364 

TERRMID: MID1364 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID1364 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1364 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1364 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1364 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1364 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1364 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1364 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID1364 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1364 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID1364 from Gibler 2018, Portugal bombed a Tanzanian village after Tanzania downed a Portuguese aircraft in Tanzanian airspace. Tanzanian territory was being used by anti-Portugal rebels for safety. Coded civil war MID because the clash between Tanzania and Portugal was driven by Portugal attempting to attack rebels in Tanzania. 

CIVWARLINK: MID1364 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1364 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1364 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1364 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1364 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1364 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
